Name: Therapist
Text: So, in conclusion, he just run away from you in a circles and hid behind bushes again?

Name: Therapist
Text: That's a bit lame tactic, if you'd ask me.

Name: Bieda
Text: Okey, okey, you're my therapist. Stop dissing me.

Name: Bieda
Text: The next night, I prepared lots of dummy dirt piles to mislead him.

Name: Therapist
Text: Tell me more, and remember to talk about your feelings.
